Overall, this game is amazing at the start. There are lots of survivors, lots of killers, I mean even licensed killers like Michael Myers, Freddy Krueger, even the Demogorgon itself. It has to be an amazing game, right? Nope.

After you've figured out how the game works it's actually the most boring and frustrating game ever. Developers cater to new players, and don't give a dang about veteran players who put hours into the game. What I mean by that is they balance the game around new players, not actual good ones, therefore this game is very unbalanced and survivor sided.

Dead by Daylight has to rely on regular sales and making the game free for a limited time to keep players coming in, and keeping the game alive. Or at least appear to be alive.

Zero rewards for being among the best players in the game. (being Rank 1)
Zero rewards for putting hours into the game. (leveling up)
An awful amount of grind to get characters. (I have only bought one character from my ~300 hours of gameplay)
Developers are on the side of survivors, and not caring about killers. Only about five killers are being used in higher ranks, because the rest is pretty much useless, and even then, if you're using the select five, it is still very difficult to win matches. And I'm saying these as a survivor main, although I have played a little bit of killer here and there.

But at least you got dedicated servers, (which are worse than being peer-to-peer sometimes) a battle pass system and store with a lot of skins so that you can give even more money to the devs.

The game director himself (Mathieu Cote) said that if you're frustrated just go and play another game. And that is also what I recommend. Save your buck, and buy another game. For example, Rainbow Six Siege, which actually costs the same as this pile of stale garbage.

OK, so after putting many many hours into this game I have decided to post a review.  I will start by saying if it was a terrible game I wouldn't have this many hours into it.  The game play is pretty good, 1 killer 4 survivors get your gens done and get out.  Now where the game is lacking is the DEVS.  The DEVS will break the game constantly with every update and they nerf killers to make the survivor mains happy.  The balance is all wrong and one sided to say the least.  The killers are nerfed any time they "over perform" yet none of the survivor perks will ever be nerfed. They are too busy making sure to add content to buy in the form of skins for the killers and survivors to actually work on the issues in the game.  Fix your game and stop worrying about the cash grabs.  With the last update they pretty much broke the game completely.  Survivors get a free perk because the sound is broken and all of the killers have glitches that cause a 5 second cool down before you can swing.  I firmly believe that the devs got this gold mine by complete accident and they will never have another successful game.  In an honest rating I would give the idea of the game play 7/10.  I would give the devs a 1/10.  Buy at your own risk.

This game is absolutely broken.  I've got many hours in and feel like I can give some sound advice and criticism. 

The game recently updated to dedicated servers which makes the gameplay laggy for both killer and survivor. You can jump through a window in a chase and get hit from 10 feet outside the window. From the killer POV, the hit looks legit.  Sometimes you will randomly lag and get hit by the killer without knowing it.  This same lag can cause the killer to swing and miss constantly.

The problem with this game though is the lack of balancing. Survivors usually get terrible perks in recent dlc's, while killers get perks that actually change the game. I'm not saying killer is OP, I'm saying that they have perks that actually allow build diversity, where as survivors mostly use meta perks such as Decisive Strike, Adrenaline, Iron Will, Borrowed Time, etc..   Playing solo survivor is an absolute nightmare in this game. Trust me on this one, unless playing survive with friends, you will be at such a disadvantage that you will just want to disconnect from the game once the killer finds you, which leads me to my next problem.

Constant disconnects will always put you at a disadvantage when playing survivor and will rob the killer of points. Disconnecting players seem to happen 1 in 3 games based on my 2000 hours of gameplay. 5 gens on the map need to be done to power the exit games. When someone disconnects, you still have to do the same amount of gens, making the workload much MUCH harder for the remaining survivors. 

In closing, the devs are completely out of touch. There are so many broken mechanics in the game, and the devs just DO NOT deal with them. Instead, we're met with constant cosmetic releases to generate revenue for them. They seem to allot resources to creating new cosmetics, but nothing that actually fixes the game. I am super glad I have not given these dum dum developers a penny of my money since the ST DLC. They don't deserve the revenue and they do not deserve to have new players.  

Trust me on this one, save your money and buy another game, because you will only be met with unbelievable frustration in your games, and nowhere to turn when the dum dum devs don't care about fixing the problems.

Kurz und knapp - dieses Game ist einfach total unbalanciert.... Wie oft musste ich schon als Rang 15 Killer gegen Rang 3 oder 4 Überlebende spielen? Dann noch die ganzen kostenpflichtigen DLC.... spart euer Geld lieber...

Edit:
Nach dem neuen "Match-Making" hat man kaum noch eine Chance ein balanciertes Game zu finden. Man spielt als Killer immer gegen "perfekte" Survivor, welche gut im Loopen sind und fast jeden "Kill" mit ner Taschenlampe rettet. Ebenfalls ist es als Survivor so, dass man gegen Killer spielen muss, die sicher schon mehr als 100h mit diesem gespielt hat. Die Spiele die man gewinnt kommen lediglich dadurch zustande, wenn der Killer/Survivor afk ist.

Do you like being treated badly at the end of every match in an online game? Do you like it when a game has a terribly toxic community that makes you want to uninstall the game everytime you play?
It's like the communities of Rainbow six, MOBAs and fighting games fused to create the ultimate toxic community, full of tryharders and detached veterans with 3000 hours ingame who brag about how cool they are, and somehow you are forced to play with them because the matchmaking is not even trying to let you have a good time.

Oh, and the game is terribly glitchy, incredibly repetitive and hitboxes suck, but that doesn't even matter when the community alone ruins the game on its own.

生存者95%キラー５％くらいのほぼ生存者専門ですがVer3.5.0の修正で破滅という鬼ほぼ必須のパークが修正されて過疎化しそうなので新規の方にはお勧めしません。

今まではキラーの方々ががんばってゲームを成立させてくれていたのですが今後はキラーが減って成立しなくなりそうです、キラーと生存者がいないと成り立たないのにキラーのほうばかり弱体化してキラーが減る調整ばかりする運営さんは正直あかんですね。

運営さんは4人の生存者のうち二人生存二人死亡のバランスを目指しているそうです、実際それくらいの試合結果で生存者はランクが上がりますがキラーのほうはランクが上がらないのでキラーやってる人のストレスを感じると思います。
